rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a dataset and a tool that was used to collect the data.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: collected Using

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data preparation method in which text is converted to lowercase. Based on transformation of the same label in OpenRefine.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Convert text to lowercase

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a dataset and a service/website that the data was collected from.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: collected From Service

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data preparation method in which data is removed from a dataset.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Remove data

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data preparation method in which multiple whitespace characters are reduced to a single character. Based on transformation of the same label in OpenRefine.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Collapse consecutive whitespace

rdf:Description.dc:creator: David Corsar
rdf:Description.dc:title: The Provenance of Research Involving Social Media ontology
rdf:Description.dc:description: This ontology is designed to capture provenance meta-data describing the use of social media data in research projects.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Milan Markovic
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: The Provenance of Research Involving Social Media ontology
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This ontology is designed to capture provenance meta-data describing the use of social media data in research projects.
Data preparation method in which the type of a datum is changed from text to date. Based on transformation of the same label in OpenRefine.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Convert text to date

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data preparation method in which a subset of a a dataset is created based on filtering data in the original.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Filter data

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data preparation method in which escaped HTML characters (e.g. &amp;) are unescaped (e..g back to &). Based on transformation of the same label in OpenRefine.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Unescape HTML entities

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date that the activity of collected data ended.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data Collection Ended

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data preparation method in which the type of a datum is changed to text. Based on transformation of the same name in OpenRefine.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Convert to text

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data preparation method in which text is transformed. Based on transformation of the same name in OpenRefine.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Transform text

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A (software) tool used to collect data.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Data Collection Tool

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data preparation method in which text is converted to uppercase. Based on transformation of the same label in OpenRefine.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Convert text to uppercase

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a data preparation activity and the preparation method/technique used.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: preparation Method Used

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A method/technique used to prepare data in some way for analysis.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Data Preparation Method

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The activity of preparing data, typically before or in-order-to perform some analysis.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Data Preparation Activity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A method utilised to analyse data.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Data analysis method

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data preparation method in which leading and trailing whitespace are removed from a piece of text. Based on transformation of the same label in OpenRefine.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Trim leading and trailing whitespace

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a data analysis activity and the analysis method used.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: analysis method used

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data preparation method in which text is converted to title case. Based on transformation of the same label in OpenRefine.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Convert text to titlecase

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date that the activity of collected data started.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data Collection Started

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The activity of performing some form of data analysis
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Data analysis activity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The activity of collecting data.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Data Collection Activity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data preparation method in which the type of a datum is changed from text to number. Based on transformation of the same label in OpenRefine.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Convert text to number
